snippet.title: Slider - Official Overview Trailer | The MIX x Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Take a deeper look at Slider, including a peek at the nine different regions of the game's world, your objectives in each, and more from this upcoming puzzle game. Slide pieces of the world to solve puzzles and help others. Control an ever-growing set of tiles and mechanics. Explore nine unique areas, unravel the mysteries of the universe, and reconnect the world -- one slider at a time. Slider is coming to PC.
